title: Star Guardian Quiz Broken

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I was doing the test for the icon, and restarted to see if there was more than one. When I started rapidly clicking answers to try to go fast just to check for more icons, I clicked on multiple ones per question before it went to the next screen. After you do this, when you restart there will appear to be multiples of the test and you can select all the answers without anything changing on screen. Even so, clicking these enough will end the test and will just repeat the glitch again.

replies.body: As Last Master said, there is only one Star Guardian icon to obtain, but you're welcome to take the quiz as many times as you'd like. :)
there's only one icon. no matter what star guardian you are you get the same icon as everyone else.
